title: Dragon Rescued Sabo
theoryText: The mysterious person Dragon is shown carrying to the Revolutionary Army ship in Episode 504 is Sabo, who survived the Celestial Dragon attack. The urgency with which the Revolutionary Army members call for a doctor, combined with Ivankov's questioning of Dragon, suggests this person is someone important. Given the timing and location (East Blue, after Sabo's ship was destroyed), fans theorized this was Sabo before his survival was officially confirmed.
author: Multiple One Piece fans
evidence: Dragon is shown returning to the ship carrying someone
Revolutionary Army members urgently call for medical help
Timing coincides with Sabo's ship being destroyed by Celestial Dragon
Dragon was in the East Blue at the time
The person's identity is deliberately hidden

title: Ace's Promise Foreshadows His Death
theoryText: Ace's promise to Luffy that he 'won't die because he has a weak little brother to take care of' is tragically ironic foreshadowing of his death at Marineford. This promise, made during their childhood training, highlights Ace's protective nature toward Luffy and makes his ultimate sacrifice even more emotionally devastating. The promise becomes tragically fulfilled in reverse - Ace dies precisely because he's protecting his little brother.
author: One Piece community analysis
evidence: Ace explicitly promises not to die
Promise is made to protect Luffy
Ace dies at Marineford protecting Luffy from Akainu
The flashback is shown after Ace's death, emphasizing the tragedy
